Vision Egg
Package VisionEgg
[frames] | no frames]

Package VisionEgg

source code


The Vision Egg package.

The Vision Egg is a programming library (with demo applications) that
uses standard, inexpensive computer graphics cards to produce visual
stimuli for vision research experiments.

Today's consumer computer graphics cards, thanks to the demands of
computer gamers, are capable of drawing and updating computer graphics
suitable for producing research-quality visual stimuli. The Vision Egg
allows the vision scientist (or anyone else) to program these cards
using OpenGL, the standard in computer graphics
programming. Potentially difficult tasks, such as initializing
graphics, getting precise timing information, controlling stimulus
parameters in real-time, and synchronizing with data acquisition are
greatly eased by routines within the Vision Egg.

See the 'Core' module for the fundamental Vision Egg classes.


Version: 1.1.dev

Submodules
  • VisionEgg.Configuration: Load config values from environment, config file, or defaults.
  • VisionEgg.Core: Core Vision Egg functionality.
  • VisionEgg.Daq: Definition of data acquisition and triggering interfaces.
  • VisionEgg.DaqKeyboard: Data acquisition and triggering over the keyboard.
  • VisionEgg.DaqLPT: Data acquisition and triggering over the parallel port.
  • VisionEgg.Deprecated: Bits of code which will be removed in the future.
  • VisionEgg.Dots: Random dot stimuli.
  • VisionEgg.FlowControl: Flow control for the Vision Egg.
  • VisionEgg.GL: Vision Egg GL module -- lump all OpenGL names in one namespace.
  • VisionEgg.GLTrace: Trace calls to OpenGL With this module, you can trace all calls made to OpenGL through PyOpenGL.
  • VisionEgg.GUI: Graphical user interface classes and functions.
  • VisionEgg.Gratings: Grating stimuli.
  • VisionEgg.MoreStimuli: Assorted stimuli.
  • VisionEgg.ParameterTypes: Type checking for the Vision Egg.
  • VisionEgg.PlatformDependent: Implementations of functions which vary by platform.
  • VisionEgg.PyroApps: VisionEgg subpackage providing support for demo applications based on Pyro
    • VisionEgg.PyroApps.AST_ext
    • VisionEgg.PyroApps.ColorCalGUI: Handle luminance and color calibration stimulus (client-side)
    • VisionEgg.PyroApps.ColorCalServer: Handle luminance and color calibration stimulus (server-side)
    • VisionEgg.PyroApps.DropinGUI
    • VisionEgg.PyroApps.DropinServer
    • VisionEgg.PyroApps.EPhysGUI
    • VisionEgg.PyroApps.EPhysGUIUtils
    • VisionEgg.PyroApps.EPhysServer
    • VisionEgg.PyroApps.FlatGratingGUI: Handle sinusoidal gratings (client-side)
    • VisionEgg.PyroApps.FlatGratingServer: Handle sinusoidal gratings (server-side)
    • VisionEgg.PyroApps.GridGUI
    • VisionEgg.PyroApps.GridServer
    • VisionEgg.PyroApps.MouseTargetGUI: Handle mouse controlled small target stimulus (client-side)
    • VisionEgg.PyroApps.MouseTargetServer: Handle mouse-controlled small targets (server-side)
    • VisionEgg.PyroApps.ScreenPositionGUI: Handle 3D perspective projection (client-side)
    • VisionEgg.PyroApps.ScreenPositionServer: Handle 3D perspective projection (server-side)
    • VisionEgg.PyroApps.SphereGratingGUI: Handle perspective-distorted sinusoidal gratings (client-side)
    • VisionEgg.PyroApps.SphereGratingServer: Handle perspective-distorted sinusoidal gratings (server-side)
    • VisionEgg.PyroApps.SpinningDrumGUI
    • VisionEgg.PyroApps.SpinningDrumServer
    • VisionEgg.PyroApps.TargetGUI: Handle small target stimulus (client-side)
    • VisionEgg.PyroApps.TargetServer: Handle small targets gratings (server-side)
    • VisionEgg.PyroApps.VarTypes
  • VisionEgg.PyroClient: Python Remote Objects support - Client side.
  • VisionEgg.PyroHelpers: Python Remote Objects support.
  • VisionEgg.QuickTime: QuickTime movies in the Vision Egg.
  • VisionEgg.ResponseControl: Response control during a presentation is running.
  • VisionEgg.SphereMap: Stimuli on spheres, including texture maps.
  • VisionEgg.TCPController: Allows control of parameter values over the network.
  • VisionEgg.Text: Text stimuli.
  • VisionEgg.Textures: Texture (images mapped onto polygons) stimuli.
  • VisionEgg.ThreeDeeMath: Vertex and matrix operations - simulate OpenGL transforms.
  • VisionEgg.WrappedText: Module containing the Multi-line text stimulus class WrappedText, as well as a simple example of its use.
  • VisionEgg.darwin_getrefresh
  • VisionEgg.gl_qt
  • VisionEgg.posix_maxpriority
  • VisionEgg.qtlowlevel
  • VisionEgg.qtmovie: high level QuickTime Movie wrapper
  • VisionEgg.win32_getrefresh
  • VisionEgg.win32_maxpriority
